title: How to Make Green Velvet Cupcakes

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350° Fahrenheit or 175° Celsius.
Line 24 cupcake liners on a cupcake tray or grease the tray.
Whisk the dry ingredients.
steps.description: In a large bowl, combine the  flour, corn starch, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Mix until fully combined.

steps.headline: Cream the butter and sugar in a separate bowl.
steps.description: Blend on high speed using an electric mixer for about 2-3 minutes.

steps.headline: Crack in the eggs and add the vanilla extract and sour cream.
Fold in the dry ingredients and mix slowly.
steps.description: Blend on low speed until the cupcake batter forms and there are no flour streaks.

steps.headline: Add the green food coloring and blend.
steps.description: Mix until the batter resembles a bright green color.

steps.headline: Scoop the cupcake batter into the cupcake cases.
Bake the cupcakes in the oven for about 15-18 minutes.
Cream the cream cheese and butter together.
steps.description: Blend until light and fluffy, taking about 2-3 minutes.

steps.headline: Pour in the sugar, heavy cream or milk, and vanilla.
steps.description: Blend once more until the frosting forms and is fluffy.

steps.headline: Place the frosting into a frosting pipe.
Pipe the frosting onto each green velvet cupcake.
Serve.
steps.description: Place a cupcake on a serving plate. Garnish with green sprinkles and/or chocolate gold coins. Enjoy!

text: Making the Cupcakes Preheat the oven to 350° Fahrenheit or 175° Celsius.  Line 24 cupcake liners on a cupcake tray or grease the tray.  Whisk the dry ingredients. In a large bowl, combine the  flour, corn starch, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Mix until fully combined. Cream the butter and sugar in a separate bowl. Blend on high speed using an electric mixer for about 2-3 minutes. Crack in the eggs and add the vanilla extract and sour cream. Blend again until fully combined. Fold in the dry ingredients and mix slowly. Blend on low speed until the cupcake batter forms and there are no flour streaks. Add the green food coloring and blend. Mix until the batter resembles a bright green color. Scoop the cupcake batter into the cupcake cases.  Bake the cupcakes in the oven for about 15-18 minutes.  Frosting and Serving Cream the cream cheese and butter together. Blend until light and fluffy, taking about 2-3 minutes. Pour in the sugar, heavy cream or milk, and vanilla. Blend once more until the frosting forms and is fluffy. Place the frosting into a frosting pipe.  Pipe the frosting onto each green velvet cupcake.  Serve. Place a cupcake on a serving plate. Garnish with green sprinkles and/or chocolate gold coins. Enjoy! Finished.
